title: My Public Apology

replies.body:
I was mature enough to write a public apology without the intent to get my account back and you children write stuff like this and you're not toxic? Leagues OCE community is the most disgusting thing on this earth above ebola and pedobears, I'll not longer be stooping to your level, so enjoy yourselves after all a keyboard warrior is a keyboard warrior xD 


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Just ignore those two, they're always like that.

It's good that you're able to reflect on your behaviour and understand why you got banned. It's also good that you've decided to make a commitment to reforming, rather than simply continuing the same behaviour on other accounts (or other games). If only more people were like you, then toxicity might not be such a big problem.

> Just stick to the triple P's.
>
> POSITIVE
> PRODUCTIVE
> PERSISTENT

I like it.

I'm just going to "borrow" this.

I still use that quote to this day, haven't been reported on my other accounts for anything or banned and have like about 80% rate of getting honoured after games, 4 months gone so far still going strong

"Leagues OCE community is the most disgusting thing on this earth above ebola and pedobears"

not toxic at all
I also still have two active accounts so I'm not going anywhere :)
